query: cheap safe clean hotels in Miami
title: Best cheap, safe, and clean hotels in Miami
excerpt: Finding affordable hotels in Miami that also prioritize safety and cleanliness can be a daunting task, especially with the city's bustling tourism scene. This curated list is invaluable for travelers seeking comfort without breaking the bank, ensuring a worry-free stay in one of the most vibrant cities in the world. With these recommendations, you can enjoy your visit to Miami knowing you have a reliable place to rest each night.
intro: Discover the best budget-friendly hotels in Miami that guarantee safety and cleanliness without compromising on comfort.

hotels.name: Hampton Inn Miami
hotels.description: Experience comfort and convenience at Hampton Inn Miami, where you can unwind in the indoor pool or stay active at the fitness center. Start your mornings with a complimentary buffet breakfast and enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout your stay. Ideally situated near popular attractions like Northeastern Oklahoma A&M College and Buffalo Run Casino, this hotel is the perfect base for exploring Miami.
hotels.highlight: Hampton Inn Miami offers free breakfast, an indoor pool, and a fitness center, ensuring a comfortable and convenient stay.

hotels.name: Days Inn by Wyndham Miami
hotels.description: Experience modern comfort at Days Inn Miami, where each room is equipped with a 48-inch smart TV, microwave, and refrigerator for your convenience. Enjoy leisure time in the indoor swimming pool or at the 24-hour front desk, ensuring a stress-free getaway. Conveniently located near popular attractions like Buffalo Run Casino and Classic Route 66, this hotel is the perfect base for your adventures.
hotels.highlight: Days Inn by Wyndham Miami offers family rooms, a saltwater pool, and modern amenities like smart TVs and microwaves.

hotels.name: Miami Princess Hotel
hotels.description: Experience the ideal blend of convenience and comfort at Miami Princess Hotel, located just a short 4-minute drive from Miami International Airport. Each room features modern amenities including a flat-screen cable TV, free Wi-Fi, and daily maid service, ensuring a relaxing stay. With complimentary airport transfers and easy access to local attractions like American Airlines Arena and South Beach, this hotel is the perfect starting point for your Miami adventure.
hotels.highlight: Offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and complimentary airport transfers, all within a short drive from Miami International Airport.

hotels.name: Motel 6-Miami, FL
hotels.description: Experience the convenience of our motel, located just 10 minutes from Miami International Airport and close to popular attractions like Melreese Golf Course and Mall of the Americas. Enjoy a range of amenities, including free Wi-Fi, an on-site restaurant, and comfortable non-smoking rooms equipped with cable TV and workspaces. With affordable shuttle services to the airport and cruise port, your stay will be both comfortable and hassle-free.
hotels.highlight: Offers comfortable non-smoking rooms, free Wi-Fi, secure parking, and affordable shuttle services to Miami International Airport.

hotels.name: Red Roof PLUS Miami Airport
hotels.description: Experience the convenience of Miami Airport Red Roof Plus, situated just five minutes from Miami International Airport with complimentary airport transfers and Wi-Fi for a hassle-free visit. Enjoy comfortable accommodations featuring flat-screen TVs and many rooms equipped with microwaves and mini-refrigerators. With Miami city center only a 10-minute drive away and South Beach just 15 minutes from the hotel, you are perfectly positioned to explore the vibrant attractions of the area.
hotels.highlight: Offers complimentary airport transfers, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable rooms with flat-screen TVs, microwaves, and mini-refrigerators.

hotels.name: Gables Inn
hotels.description: Discover The Gables Inn, a charming retreat in Coral Gables, conveniently located less than a mile from the University of Miami. Enjoy stylish accommodations featuring cable TV and sleek tile flooring, along with relaxing amenities like a sun terrace and an on-site business center. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, The Gables Inn offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
hotels.highlight: Offers stylish accommodations with cable TV, a sun terrace, and secure parking in a charming Coral Gables setting.
